name: Create Custom Fields User Values Partitioned

dependsOn.activity: LUP Migration Tables Custom Fields Values

activities.name: EP Create Custom Fields User Values
LUP Migration Tables Custom Fields Values

source.query:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS migration_user_custom_fields_values;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS migration_user_custom_fields_values as
(
select
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY user_id) row_num, t.*
    from
    (select
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c'/*ShortText*/ then convert(cv.text, char(4000)) else
    case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792'/*TrueFalse*/ then convert((cv.checked = 1), char(4000)) else
        case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a'/*LongText*/ then convert(cv.textArea, char(4000)) else
            case when mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2'/*DateTime*/ then convert(cv.date, char(4000)) 
                end end end end userValue,
    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where mcf.areaType = @{variables('rpCustomFieldType')}
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId in ('0f6f2372-1e4c-4d67-ad13-615a0540488c', 'd8bd3d80-d25d-4056-8754-a740f2396792', 'b9847d16-19b5-4ed4-a4e3-d7f07533ab5a', '1eccbe40-1b3b-461b-95df-35f1fe6a8af2')
union
-- add picklist values
    select 
    uuid() newCustomFieldValueId,
    cv.user_id,
    cv.field_id,
    mcf.areaType,
    convert(cfc.name, char(4000)) userValue,
    ud.newUserId,
    mcf.newCustomFieldId
    from t_custom_value cv
    join t_custom_field_choice cfc on cv.choice_id = cfc.id
    join migration_all_user_data ud on ud.userId = cv.user_id
    join migration_custom_fields mcf on mcf.id = cv.field_id
    where user_id is not null
    and mcf.areaType = @{variables('rpCustomFieldType')}
    and mcf.customFieldDataTypeId = 'aad6f035-05f9-42d3-b6ea-682371340875' /*PICKLIST*/);

select count(*) customFieldsCount from migration_user_custom_fields_values;
